name: Football Soccer Game free
description:
***Get ready for extreme real football and become a top soccer player

Select your favorite country compete with toughest football teams to become hero.
Smooth game play and stunning graphics will take you to dream football stadium where you are controlling your team like a manager and make every player come to life on your screen during games. Fight and show skills to acquire soccer, conquer opponent team defense to score goal.

How to Play
- Use Joystick to control the movement of player present left bottom of your iphone ipad device.
- Press ‘Shoot’ to kick the ball present right bottom of your apple mobile.
- Tap ‘Sprint’ to move the player fast.
- Adjust camera to your comfort zone by swiping anywhere on your ipad.
- Tap’ Pass’ to pass the football to your fellow team member present just above sprint.
- Tap ‘Tackle’ to snatch the football from opponent.
- In penalty section you can hit ball by swiping anywhere on iphone mobile to kick.
Features
- best ios free offline football shoot game.
- Supports all apple devices.
- Realistic 3d graphics with dynamic lighting and amazing stadium effects.
- Over 15 animations of players.
- top flick shoot game.
- look like real live football match on your apple mobile.
- game with user friendly GUI and controls.
- Soccer war now on your hd iphone, ipad devices.
- Good quality sound effects.
- Efficient player controls & opponent team player AI.
